user.description: Add a instance of Bing Wallpaper. If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/ndesgranges/bing-wallpaper

data.name: Name
data.refresh_rate: Refresh rate of the image in minutes
data.index: Index (offset of the day for the image of the day)

error.invalid_index: The value provided for index is not valid, see documentation
